title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 6 - Enforcement; Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 6 - Enforcement; Prohibitions

State Regulations
§ 6.1 - Certification for payment for services
§ 6.2 - Prohibition against questions eliciting information concerning political affiliation
§ 6.3 - Dual employment in the state service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 6

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
